summary: Create a landing page for DirectSell.AI that explains how users can use the AI to reach potential customers.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- DirectSell.AI wordmark logo, modern minimal typography on transparent background (directsellai-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
- Abstract AI + outreach hero illustration with warm, modern palette, no text (directsellai-hero-illustration.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive landing page for “DirectSell.AI” that clearly explains the product and who it is for (helping users reach potential customers using AI), using English for all user-facing copy.

Include a top navigation and hero section with: product name (DirectSell.AI), a one-sentence value proposition, and at least one primary call-to-action button (e.g., “Get Started” / “See How It Works”).

Add a “How it works” section that teaches users how to use DirectSell.AI to reach potential customers. Present as a clear step-by-step flow (3–6 steps) with short descriptions and example prompts/messages.

Add supporting sections that reinforce the product story: (a) Key benefits/features (3–6 items), (b) Use cases (at least 3 audience scenarios), (c) FAQ (at least 4 questions), and (d) Footer with basic links (e.g., Privacy, Terms placeholders) and a short tagline.

Apply a coherent visual theme for the landing page (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) with a distinct style appropriate for an AI sales/outreach product; enforce it consistently across all sections (avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors).
Add generated static brand visuals to the landing page by placing them in frontend/public/assets/generated and using them in the hero and/or navigation (do not serve images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Design and build a landing page for DirectSell.AI, including instructions on how to use the AI to reach potential customers.
